description.zh-cn: 赵武灵王长子，原为太子，后被废。因发动沙丘之乱夺位失败而被杀。
description.en: The eldest son of King Wuling of Zhao, he was the original crown prince but was later deposed. He was killed after launching the failed Shaqiu Rebellion to seize the throne.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期赵国君主。在沙丘之乱中，因收留兵败的公子章，被其叔赵成与将领李兑围困宫殿，最终饿死。
description.en: A monarch of the State of Zhao during the Warring States period. During the Shaqiu Rebellion, he was besieged in his palace by his uncle Zhao Cheng and general Li Dui and eventually starved to death for sheltering the defeated Gongzi Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期赵国君主，赵武灵王之子，公子章的异母弟。沙丘之乱的主要目标，但并未被杀害。
description.en: A monarch of the State of Zhao during the Warring States period, son of King Wuling of Zhao and half-brother of Gongzi Zhang. He was the main target of the Shaqiu Rebellion but was not killed.

description.zh-cn: 赵武灵王夫人，公子章之母，出身于韩国公族。
description.en: Wife of King Wuling of Zhao and mother of Gongzi Zhang, from the ducal clan of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 前295年，赵国公子章为夺回王位而针对赵惠文王发动的兵变，最终失败并导致赵武灵王一同身亡。
description.en: In 295 BC, a coup launched by Gongzi Zhang of Zhao against King Huiwen of Zhao to reclaim the throne. It ultimately failed and led to the death of King Wuling of Zhao as well.

description.zh-cn: 赵国宗室，赵武灵王叔父。与李兑一同平定沙丘之乱，杀死了公子章，并围困饿死了赵武灵王。
description.en: A member of the Zhao royal clan and uncle of King Wuling of Zhao. Together with Li Dui, he suppressed the Shaqiu Rebellion, killed Gongzi Zhang, and besieged and starved King Wuling of Zhao to death.

description.zh-cn: 赵国将领。与赵成一同平定沙丘之乱，杀死了公子章，并围困饿死了赵武灵王。
description.en: A general of the State of Zhao. Together with Zhao Cheng, he suppressed the Shaqiu Rebellion, killed Gongzi Zhang, and besieged and starved King Wuling of Zhao to death.

description.zh-cn: 赵武灵王的宠妃，赵惠文王之母。
description.en: A favored concubine of King Wuling of Zhao and the mother of King Huiwen of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 公子章的宰相，与其一同发动沙丘之乱。
description.en: The chancellor of Gongzi Zhang, who launched the Shaqiu Rebellion with him.

description.zh-cn: 赵国宰相，在沙丘之乱中被杀害。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Zhao, killed during the Shaqiu Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 赵国将军，率军平定沙丘之乱。
description.en: A general of the State of Zhao who led troops to suppress the Shaqiu Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代君主制国家储君的封号。
description.en: The title of the heir apparent in ancient Chinese monarchies.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 公子章是赵武灵王的长子。
description.en: Gongzi Zhang was the eldest son of King Wuling of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 公子章是韩夫人的儿子。
description.en: Gongzi Zhang was the son of Lady Han.

description.zh-cn: 赵惠文王是赵武灵王的儿子。
description.en: King Huiwen of Zhao was the son of King Wuling of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵惠文王是吴娃的儿子。
description.en: King Huiwen of Zhao was the son of Wu Wa.

description.zh-cn: 公子章是赵惠文王的异母兄。
description.en: Gongzi Zhang was the older half-brother of King Huiwen of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 韩夫人是赵武灵王的夫人。
description.en: Lady Han was the wife of King Wuling of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 赵武灵王宠幸吴娃。
description.en: King Wuling of Zhao favored Wu Wa.

description.zh-cn: 韩夫人是韩国公族女子。
description.en: Lady Han was a woman from the ducal clan of the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 公子章原为赵国太子，后被赵武灵王所废。
description.en: Gongzi Zhang was originally the crown prince of Zhao but was later deposed by King Wuling of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 因宠幸吴娃，赵武灵王废黜了公子章的太子之位，改立吴娃之子赵何。
description.en: Due to his favor for Wu Wa, King Wuling of Zhao deposed Gongzi Zhang as crown prince and appointed Wu Wa's son, Zhao He, instead.

description.zh-cn: 赵武灵王将王位禅让给儿子赵何，即赵惠文王。
description.en: King Wuling of Zhao abdicated the throne to his son Zhao He, who became King Huiwen of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 公子章为夺回王位发动了沙丘之乱。
description.en: Gongzi Zhang launched the Shaqiu Rebellion to reclaim the throne.

description.zh-cn: 田不礼作为公子章的宰相，与其一同发动了沙丘之乱。
description.en: As the chancellor of Gongzi Zhang, Tian Buli launched the Shaqiu Rebellion with him.

description.zh-cn: 赵国宰相肥义在沙丘之乱中被杀害。
description.en: The Chancellor of Zhao, Fei Yi, was killed during the Shaqiu Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 沙丘之乱的目标是杀死赵惠文王，但未能成功。
description.en: The goal of the Shaqiu Rebellion was to kill King Huiwen of Zhao, but it did not succeed.

description.zh-cn: 赵国将军高信率军平定了沙丘之乱。
description.en: The Zhao general Gao Xin led his army to suppress the Shaqiu Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 在平定沙丘之乱后，赵成与李兑在主父宫杀死了公子章。
description.en: After suppressing the Shaqiu Rebellion, Zhao Cheng and Li Dui killed Gongzi Zhang in the Lord Father's palace.

description.zh-cn: 在平定沙丘之乱后，李兑与赵成在主父宫杀死了公子章。
description.en: After suppressing the Shaqiu Rebellion, Li Dui and Zhao Cheng killed Gongzi Zhang in the Lord Father's palace.

description.zh-cn: 因害怕赵武灵王报复，赵成与李兑围困主父宫，导致赵武灵王饿死。
description.en: Fearing retaliation from King Wuling of Zhao, Zhao Cheng and Li Dui besieged the Lord Father's palace, causing King Wuling to starve to death.

description.zh-cn: 因害怕赵武灵王报复，李兑与赵成围困主父宫，导致赵武灵王饿死。
description.en: Fearing retaliation from King Wuling of Zhao, Li Dui and Zhao Cheng besieged the Lord Father's palace, causing King Wuling to starve to death.

description.zh-cn: 田不礼是公子章受封于代地时的宰相。
description.en: Tian Buli was the chancellor of Gongzi Zhang when he was enfeoffed in Dai.

description.zh-cn: 肥义是赵国宰相。
description.en: Fei Yi was the Chancellor of the State of Zhao.
